species.name: dubwool
descriptions: Its majestic horns are meant only to impress the opposite gender. They never see use in battle.
Weave a carpet from its springy wool, and you end up with something closer to a trampoline. Youâ€™ll start to bounce the moment you set foot on it.

abilities.name: fluffy
abilities.effect: Damage from contact moves is halved.  Damage from Fire moves is doubled.

abilities.name: steadfast
abilities.effect: Raises Speed one stage upon flinching.

abilities.name: bulletproof
abilities.effect: Protects against bullet, ball, and bomb-based moves.
